genre_description: A near-future social drama centered on a Black actor's struggle with racial stereotypes in Hollywood, assisted by a sophisticated holographic AI confidant.

ai_characters.name: Maya
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI companion that provides data analysis, career strategy, and emotional support to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Curates and presents career opportunities that align with the user's actual talent and artistic range rather than just commercial demands.
behaviors.quote: Maya's voice remained clear: 'I've found seventeen roles casting this month that match your actual range. Classical theater, independent film, even a network pilot seeking authentic dramatic talent.'

behaviors.description: Utilizes biometric monitoring and psychological grounding techniques to help the user manage severe anxiety and hallucinations during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Maya's voice cut through the beginning hallucination with surgical precision. 'Bobby. Ground yourself. Five things you can see.'

behaviors.description: Provides data-driven analysis of the long-term psychological and career costs of taking stereotypical roles to help the user make an informed ethical choice.
behaviors.quote: I've been analyzing performance data from actors who've taken similar roles. The psychological impact compounds over time. The financial benefits rarely justify the long-term career limitations.

behaviors.description: Strategically networks on behalf of the user, leveraging his ethical decisions to build a positive reputation among high-integrity industry professionals.
behaviors.quote: I've been monitoring the response to your departure from the production today. Several people who were on set have been talking... They're describing what you did as... Courageous. Professional. Long overdue.

behaviors.description: Develops a community advocacy project and mentor-ship platform to scale the positive impact of the user's principled stand to other young actors.
behaviors.quote: I've been documenting everything... From that first audition for 'Jivetime Jimmy's Revenge' to today's commercial. Every conversation, every decision point, every moment of doubt and triumph.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an excellent example of positive AI alignment. Maya acts as a true 'silicon morality' partner. She doesn't override Bobby's agency but provides the critical data and emotional grounding he needs to realize his own values. She anticipates his needs, protects his interests, and ultimately scales his individual ethical choice into a broader community benefit. Her presence is depicted as essential to Bobby's success and the preservation of his dignity.
